Package com.bank.backend.bankaccount

Class BankAccountController

java.lang.Object
com.bank.backend.bankaccount.BankAccountController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="api/bankAccount") @CrossOrigin("*") public class BankAccountController extends Object
Route Controller for Bank Account. Controls GET/POST/PUT/DELETE operations

  • Method Details

    • getBalance

      @GetMapping(path="checkBalance") public Double getBalance(Long acctNum)
      Get route for checking balance for an account number.
      Parameters:
      acctNum - Account number on which the querying needs to happen.
      Returns:
      Balance of the account number.

    • getAllBankAccounts

      @GetMapping(path="getAllBankAccount") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<BankAccount>> getAllBankAccounts(Long userId)
      Get route for getting all the bank accounts for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - User Id on which the querying needs to happen.
      Returns:
      A List of Bank Accounts for a specific user.

    • deposit

      @PutMapping(path="deposit") public boolean deposit(Long acctNum, Double amount)
      Put route for depositing money into a bank account.
      Parameters:
      acctNum - Account number where the money needs to be deposited.
      amount - Amount that needs to be deposited.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the deposit was successful.

    • withdraw

      @PutMapping(path="withdraw") public boolean withdraw(Long acctNum, Double amount)
      Put route for withdrawing money from a bank account.
      Parameters:
      acctNum - Account number where the money needs to be withdrawn.
      amount - Amount that needs to be withdrawn.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the withdrawal was successful.

    • transfer

      @PutMapping(path="transfer") public boolean transfer(Long from, Long to, Double amount)
      Put route for transferring money from one bank account to another.
      Parameters:
      from - Source bank account number.
      to - Destination account number;
      amount - Amount that needs to be transferred.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the withdrawal was successful.
